titleStmt.title: A defence of the Way to the true Church against A.D. his reply Wherein the motives leading to papistry, and questions, touching the rule of faith, the authoritie of the Church, the succession of the truth, and the beginning of Romish innouations: are handled and fully disputed. By Iohn White Doctor of Diuinity, sometime of Gunwell and Caius Coll. in Cambridge.
titleStmt.author: White, John, 1570-1615.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Richard Field] for William Barret dwelling in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the three Pigeons,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Fisher, John. A reply made unto Mr. Anthony Wotton and Mr. John White ministers.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
